info.name: BridgeDkPrintable
info.description: Print most of the debate, news and informational pages of the Danish Bridge Federation websites (including the festival and result sites) in a reasonably compact, good-looking way.  For some ranking lists you may still have to reduce the scale to avoid clipping at the right edge of the page.
info.additionalInfo:
* 20180815 r1.1.0: Add support for BC3 result pages (resultater.bridge.dk)

* 20160710 r1.0.0: First public release
